duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the electrical engineering of multiple projects from concept through construction phases.
Investigate existing electrical systems to determine scope of work required for project completion.
Assign specific design tasks or calculations to lower-level engineering and design support staff.
Provide working knowledge of project design, construction, design software, cost, and scheduling on assigned projects.
Review shop drawings, respond to RFI’s, and attend on-site meetings during the construction phase.
Assist in the development of business unit design standards and specification.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering from an ABET accredited institution
